0.text: We can change the words and their meanings by adding a letter group to positive adjectives at the end. These new words help to compare.
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>We can change the words and their meanings by adding a letter group to positive adjectives at the end. These new words help to compare.</prosody></speak>

2.text: Positive Comparative Superlative happy happier happiest easy easier easiest pretty prettier prettiest dirty dirtier dirtiest fast faster fastest
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Positive Comparative Superlative happy happier happiest easy easier easiest pretty prettier prettiest dirty dirtier dirtiest fast faster fastest</prosody></speak>

3.text: Note the letter changes of some words that occur when we make the comparative and the superlative forms.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Note the letter changes of some words that occur when we make the comparative and the superlative forms.</prosody></speak>

4.text: We add "more" and "most" to make the comparative and the superlative forms when the positive word is longer than six letters.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>We add "more" and "most" to make the comparative and the superlative forms when the positive word is longer than six letters.</prosody></speak>

5.text: Positive Comparative Superlative beautiful more beautiful most beautiful enjoyable more enjoyable most enjoyable attractive more attractive most attractive dangerous more dangerous most dangerous helpful more helpful most helpful
